import React from 'react' import Table from '../components/table/Table' import List from '../components/list_img/List' import customerList from '../assets/JsonData/customers-list.json' import { products } from '../assets/JsonData/products' import { image_color } from '../assets/JsonData/image_color' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const customerTableHead = [ '', 'name', 'image', 'brand', 'Staff Name', 'Create At', 'Update At', 'Purchase Price', 'Price', 'Status', 'Total order', '', '' ] const renderHead = (item, index) => {item} const renderBody = (item, index) => ( {item.id} {item.name} {item.brand} {item.Staff_Name} {item.Create_At} {item.Update_At} {item.purchase_price} {item.price} {item.status} {item.total_orders} ) const Products = () => { console.log(image_color); return (

Products

renderHead(item, index)} bodyData={products} renderBody={(item, index) => renderBody(item, index)} /> ) } export default Products
